message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value, even at that price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
